# Gurdwara Shri Singh Sabha Sahib

| established           =
| mapframe          = yes
| mapframe-zoom     = 14
| mapframe-wikidata = yes
}}
Gurdwara Shri Singh Sabha Sahib () is a gurdwara in Pocheon, Gyeonggi Province, South Korea. It was established on November 21, 2004. , it is the only Sikh temple in the country. The building has two floors, and is decorated with images of Sikh religious figures and history. Many members of the small Sikh community in South Korea congregate at the gurdwara each week.

* Sikhism in South Korea
